attributes.additional_details:
Because  the same percentage increase is applied to both the old and the new State Pensions there is an ever increasing monetary difference between the two with those on the old State Pension falling further and further behind.
I believe the Government ( Chancellor ) should work towards equalising the pensions.
attributes.background: The Government ( Chancellor ) to consider the differences between payments to those on the old State Pension and those on the new State Pension.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614050
